metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Always See Your Face has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Always See Your Face is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
